characterDescription: Brightlord Tavinar is the father of Eylita Tavinar, who is betrothed to Nan Balat. He is a Vorin landowner of lower-dahn (to Nan Balat) from Vedenar, whom Brightlord Lin Davar does not like.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is a slender, well-dressed man, currently wearing a deep red silk coat.
